Data Fields
Bsp_Ar12xxGpioInputParams Struct Reference
External Device Interface API » AR12XX Radar Sensor API

GPIO Input configuration parameters for each radar device connected to the host SoC. More...

#include <bsp_ar12xx.h>

Data Fields

UInt8 gpioInstId
 
UInt8 gpioPinNum
 
UInt16 cpuIntrIdForGpio
 

Detailed Description

GPIO Input configuration parameters for each radar device connected to the host SoC.

Field Documentation

UInt16 Bsp_Ar12xxGpioInputParams::cpuIntrIdForGpio

CPU Interrupt Id used to service the GPIO Interrupt

UInt8 Bsp_Ar12xxGpioInputParams::gpioInstId

GPIO Instance number being used for the host interrupt. 0 - GPIO1, 1 - GPIO2 and so on. The host interrupt is used by the AR12 to indicate that the AR12 wants to send a message to the host.

UInt8 Bsp_Ar12xxGpioInputParams::gpioPinNum

Pin number corresponding to the GPIO host interrupt. 0 - 1st Pin 1 - 2nd Pin and so on.
